Package com.gcu.controller

Class ProductController

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.controller.ProductController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/products") public class ProductController extends Object
The Controller that handles all routing for product pages

    • createProduct

      @PostMapping("/createProduct") public String createProduct​(@Valid @Valid ProductModel productModel, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the creating of the product and if valid routes back to the products page - if errors, routes back to the create product form and displays validation errors
      Parameters:
      productModel - (product information)
      bindingResult - (error logging)
      model - (page model)
      Returns:
      either create product or products page based on if the data was valid

      Parameters:

      bindingResult - (error log)
      model - (page model)
      Returns:
      products with a success/fail message
